prompt.prompt: The dot plot below is a name length visualization created by a group of 25 students (Group C). The next four questions refer to this visualization.
The difference (in letters) between the longest name and the shortest name is 8.
The most common name length is 5 letters.
More than half of the students' names have fewer than 5 letters.
There are no students with 6-letter names.

Consider how the dot plot below would be different if the student named Sebastian weren’t in the class. Select each statement below that correctly describes a new dot plot of the class’ names without Sebastian.

The community of xville is up in arms that the school doesn't represent the diversity of their city.

 The people of Townsville feel that the demographics of their magnet arts school do NOT represent the diversity of the city, and want the school board to make some changes!  

 The bar chart and pie chart shown below both display the demographics of the school. The school board wants to HIDE the problem, rather than fix it. Which visualization will they use?
